name: HIGHRISE
description:
HighRise is a top down shooter where the goal is to kill everyone on the floor allowing you to open the elevator and proceed to the next floor. 100 floors to clear in the "story mode" with a boss every 10, plus thousands of randomly generated floors for you to test your mettle and see how many floors you can survive in "OneLifeMode" that are regenerated each day.
  • Random Generation
  • Top Down Shooter
  • 18 Different Weapons
  • 10 boss levels
  • Timed Levels
